headline: Tell HN: G Suite legacy free edition got revived
description:
It looks like Google backpedaled on their decision to force people to upgrade their "Google Apps for your Domain" accounts.

https://support.google.com/a/answer/60217?hl=en

> If you’re using the G Suite legacy free edition for non-commercial purposes, you can opt out of the transition to Google Workspace by clicking here […] You can continue using your custom domain(s) with Gmail, retain access to no-cost Google services such as Google Drive and Google Meet, and keep your purchases and data.
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：G套件遗留的免费版被恢复了
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：G套件遺留的免費版被恢復了
description_zh-Hans:
看起来谷歌对他们强迫人们升级他们的"Google Apps for your Domain"账户的决定进行了反悔。

https://support.google.com/a/answer/60217?hl=en

> 如果你出于非商业目的使用G套件的传统免费版，你可以通过点击这里选择不过渡到Google Workspace [...] 你可以继续使用你的自定义域名和Gmail，保留对Google Drive和Google Meet等免费Google服务的访问，并保留你的采购和数据。
description_zh-Hant:
看起來谷歌對他們強迫人們升級他們的"Google Apps for your Domain"賬戶的決定進行了反悔。

https://support.google.com/a/answer/60217?hl=en

> 如果你出於非商業目的使用G套件的傳統免費版，你可以通過點擊這裡選擇不過渡到Google Workspace [...] 你可以繼續使用你的自定義域名和Gmail，保留對Google Drive和Google Meet等免費Google服務的訪問，並保留你的採購和數據。
